name: Agent Tooling CLIs
description: Installs optional coding agent client CLIs (Codex, Claude, Gemini).

codexVersion.description: Version (semver or tag) of the Codex CLI to install.

claudeVersion.description: Version (semver or tag) of the Claude CLI to install.

geminiVersion.description: Version (semver or tag) of the Gemini CLI to install.

cacheDir.description: Directory containing cached npm tarballs for the selected CLIs.

offline.description: Block network fetches; requires cacheDir tarballs for each enabled CLI.
